meanings.definition: A type of kayak used by the Inuit people.
meanings.sent1: The qajaqs glided gracefully on the icy waters.
meanings.sent2: The Inuit fishermen relied on their qajaqs for hunting.
meanings.sent3: The qajaqs decided to have a race to see who was the fastest.
meanings.sent4: The qajaqs lined up like a row of colorful birds ready to take flight.
meanings.sent5: The sleek design of the qajaqs made them perfect for navigating narrow passages.

meanings.sent1: The group of qajaqs bobbed up and down in the choppy sea.
meanings.sent2: The qajaqs were stored safely on the shore until the next expedition.
meanings.sent3: The qajaqs gathered together for a meeting to discuss their adventures.
meanings.sent4: The fleet of qajaqs looked like a family of seals swimming in unison.
meanings.sent5: The colorful qajaqs stood out against the white snow, a beautiful sight to behold.
